desambilightrangespreadradius.message: Pozitivne vrijednosti povećavaju veličinu sjene, negativne vrijednosti smanjuju veličinu.

desatmosontotlmode.message: Show the atmosphere lighting effect only when TOtL mode is enabled

desautodimdelay.message: Brighten the background again when the video has ended after

desautostop.message: Stop playing the video automatically when I open a web page

descontextmenus.message: Prikaži kontekstni izbornik za usredotočenje na stavku.

description.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the videos as if you were in the cinema. Works for YouTube™ and beyond.

descriptionshort.message: Cijela stranica će zatamniti, tako da možete gledati video kao da ste u kinu.

desdarkbrowsertheme.message: Switch to a dark browser theme

deseyetimesaver.message: Kada je stranica neaktivna (bez ulaza miša/tipkovnice) nakon određenog vremena, stranica će se automatski zamračiti.

desgamepad.message: Control the multimedia with your game controller

desgamepadonly.message: Activate the Game Controller only on the following site(s):

deshead.message: Prikaži traku YouTube kanala ili ime.

deshovervideo.message: Hover your mouse on the video element for certain number of seconds, after which the webpage automatically dims

desintroduce.message: All the features you're used to, with a brand new look and feel, and personalized to you.

deslampandnightmode.message: Activate the 'Night Mode' option when you click on the gray lamp button

deslikebar.message: Prikaži sviđa mi se/ne sviđa mi se traku na YouTube videozapisima.

desnightactivetime.message: The switch will be visible between the following times:

desnighthover.message: Show a transparent switch on the web page

desnightmodegesture.message: Make the page go dark or light by long-pressing the current web page

desnightmodeos.message: Automatically switch the current web page to Night Mode if the OS appearance is set to Dark

desnightmodeswitchhide.message: Automatically hide the night switch after your chosen seconds

desnightonly.message: Prikaži Noćni Način samo na slijedećoj(im) stranici(ama):

desnightowl.message: One click converts the page directly into a night theme with a clickable hyperlink. Click it again to return to normal view. Click the lamp button again to disable this feature.

desnighttheme.message: Prikazuje tipku za noćni prekidač ispod web stranice da napravi stranicu tamnom ili svjetlom.

despassword.message: Zahtijeva lozinku za ulaz prije ponovnog uključivanja svjetla.

desratebad.message: Sorry you have had this bad experience. Please let us know on how we can improve our extension for you.

desratebadtitle.message: How can we make it better?

desrategood.message: Happy to hear that you love Turn Off the Lights! Will you take a moment to rate us in the browser extension store? Your browser extension store reviews make a difference!

desratetitle.message: Do you love this browser extension?

desreadera.message: Uvijek prikaži traku razine zatamnjenosti kada se svjetla ugase.

desreadern.message: Nikad ne prikazuj traku razine zatamnjenosti.

desreflection.message: Show the reflection effect on all videos

desregularuser.message: This is default and the regular setting for new users. When clicking the gray lamp button, this style will be applied to the current web page.

desremrate.message: If you like Turn Off the Lights™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

desscreenprotection.message: One click shades the page to a soothing orange color to decrease eye strain to all open tabs. Click the lamp button again to disable this feature.

desscrolltip.message: You can scroll inside the top navigation bar and the color bars. When you scroll horizontally, you can see more buttons in this bar.

destapstar.message: Tap a star to rate it on the browser extension store.

functionactive.message: This function is activated when you click on a tab, or when you refresh the web page. However, this function stops automatically after 15 seconds.

gamecontrollerstep1description.message: Connect your Game Controller to your device via USB or Bluetooth.

gamecontrollerstep3description.message: Open any web page, and press any button to activate the Game Controller.

helpautodim.message: The 'Eye protection' mode is enabled and needs to be disabled first to use the below feature.

helpeyeprotection.message: Omogućavanje 'Zaštite očiju' automatski će onemogućiti  značajku 'Automatsko reproduciranje'.

installadblocker.message: Ako ne želite vidjeti reklame, koristite proširenje koje blokira reklame.

longdonatetext.message: Uistinu cijenim ako mi možete donirati da zadržim ovo proširenje preglednika živim za druge nove korisnike. Bilo da je to $$1 ili $100 vaša podrška je neizmjerno cijenjena!

nightstep2description.message: Open any web page, and you see this night switch.

nightstep3description.message: Click on the switch to see the web page in a dark theme.

nmcustom.message: Custom (click, hold and move the switch to the desired screen location)

optionprofilesaved.message: New lamp action is saved successfully!

permissionactivetab.message: This will only dim the web page on the currently open tab page.

permissionalarms.message: This is to schedule code execution, either periodically or at a specific time in the future.

permissionallurl.message: This is to control the lamp button on all websites that include http, https, file, and ftp.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This is to add the "Darken this page" menu item in the web browser context menu.

permissionoption.message: Permission must be enabled to use this feature.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.

permissionstorage.message: This is to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissiontabs.message: This is needed for the following features: to show you the welcome and guide page, detect the current playing HTML5 video, take a screenshot of the HTML5 video, and to open the Options page.

permissiontheme.message: This is to change the web browser user interface in a dark or light theme.

permissionwebnav.message: This is to add the Night Mode immediately before the web page loads.

ratedes.message: Please rate and review the extension on the Store. Your support is really appreciated.

titlelanalyticprivacy.message: Turn Off the Lights browser extension takes your privacy very seriously. The Turn Off the Lights Analytics you are seeing on this page is only stored locally on your computer. Your personal site engagement information will not be sold and not transferred to unaffiliated third parties.
